We are a theoretical & computational research group at Department of Materials Science and Engineering, National University of Singapore. Our research focuses on applying first-principles calculations, statistical mechanics, and machine learning to understand materials chemistry and address challenges in renewable energy applications.

The AM3 Group will start in July 2025. We are looking for Ph.D. students and research scholars to join the team. Please see openings!
